set.name: SD05
set.longname: SD05 Waltz of the Undying Night

card.name: Rose Queen
card.text: (F) Select any number of Pixie followers in your EX area and transform them into Thorn Burst tokens. (A) (tap): Recover X play points. X equals the number of Thorn Burst tokens in your EX area.

card.name: Ancient Elf
card.text: (E) 1: Evolve this follower. Ward. (F) Return another card on your field to its owner’s hand: Give this follower +1/+1

card.name: Ancient Elf (Evolved)
card.text: Ward. On Evolve, return another card on your field to its owner’s hand: Give this follower +1/+1.

card.name: Rhinoceroach
card.text: (E) (0): Evolve this follower. Rush. (F) Give this follower +X/+0. X equals the number of cards you’ve played this turn, excluding this card.

card.name: Rhinoceroach (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Choose one of the following effects. (1) Give this follower Storm. (2) Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it X damage. X equals this follower’s attack.

card.name: Robin Hood
card.text: (F) Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage. (tap) (1), (A): Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage.

card.name: Silver Bolt
card.text: [Quick] Select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field. Draw a card and then deal X damage to the selected enemy. X equals the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Homecoming
card.text: Select an enemy follower on the field. Its controller puts it on the top or bottom of its owner’s deck. Combo (5): Each opponent puts each follower from their field on the top or bottom of its owner’s deck instead. (The controllers determine the placement. Tokens put into a player’s deck are removed from the game.)

card.name: Elven Princess Mage
card.text: (E) (1): Evolve this follower.

card.name: Elven Princess Mage (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Put 2 Fairy Wisp tokens into your EX area.

card.name: Blessed Fairy Dancer
card.text: (F) Give +1/+1 to each other Pixie follower on your field and in your EX area.

card.name: Elf Child May
card.text: (F) Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage. When this card is returned to hand from your field, select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

card.name: Fairy Beast
card.text: (A) Banish a Pixie follower in your EX area: Give your leader +3 defense and draw a card. This ability can be activated once per turn.

card.name: Noble Fairy
card.text: Ward. (F) Combo (3): Select an enemy follower on the field. Destroy it and summon a Fairy token on that follower’s field.

card.name: Nature’s Guidance
card.text: Select a card on your field. Return it to its owner’s hand and draw a card.

card.name: Harvest Festival
card.text: (A) (1), (tap), put this card into your cemetery: Give your leader +1 defense. When this card leaves your field, draw a card.

card.name: Elf Metallurgist
card.text: (F) Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage. Combo (3): Deal 3 damage instead.

card.name: Archer
card.text: (E) (1): Evolve this follower. Whenever another follower is put onto your field, select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

card.name: Archer (Evolved)
card.text: Whenever another follower is put onto your field, select up to 2 enemy followers on the field and deal them 1 damage.

card.name: Fairy Whisperer
card.text: (F) Summon a Fairy token. Put a Fairy token into your EX area.

card.name: Okami
card.text: Whenever another follower is put onto your field, give this follower +1/+1.

card.name: Mana Elk
card.text: Whenever one of your Pixie followers attacks, select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

card.name: Fairy Circle
card.text: Put 3 Fairy tokens into your EX area.

card.name: Woodkin Curse
card.text: [Quick] Select an enemy follower on the field. It cannot deal damage this turn.

card.name: Woodland Refuge
card.text: (F) Select a Pixie follower on your field and give it +1/+0. (tap) (1), (A): Return this card to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Aiela, Dragon Knight
card.text: Assail. (L) Increase your maximum play points by 1.

card.name: Thorn Burst
card.text: Select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field. Deal it 3 damage and draw a card.

card.name: Magic Sediment
card.text: Stack. (Amulets with Stack are put onto the field with 1 Stack counter and have the following abilities. When this card would leave the field, remove 1 Stack counter from it instead. When this card’s Stack count reaches 0, destroy it. (A) (tap) : Select another amulet with Stack on your field and transfer all this card’s Stack counters to that card.

card.name: Mimi
card.text: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 2 damage.

card.text: Select a follower on your field and give it +2/+0.

card.name: Evolution Point
card.text: At the start of the game, the player who goes second has 3 Evolution Points. You can use an Evolution Point toward paying an (E) cost by flipping this card over so that the back is showing. An Evolution Point is equal to 1 play point. (Only 1 Evolution Point can be used per evolution.)

card.name: Aria, Fairy Princess
card.text: Ward. (F) Put up to 9 Fairy tokens onto your field or into your EX area. While this card is on your field, your other Pixie followers have Rush.

card.name: Titania’s Sanctuary
card.text: (F) Give each Pixie token on your field +1/+1. While this card is on your field, your Pixie tokens have Assail. Whenever a Pixie token is put onto your field, give it +1/+1.

card.text: Whenever another follower is put onto your field, give this follower +1/+1.

card.name: Rune Blade Summoner

card.name: Sorcery Cache
